component.name: GeForce Infinity
component.summary: Next-gen GeForce NOW client for Linux

description.p: GeForce Infinity is a next-gen application designed to enhance the GeForce NOW experience. Originally created to address the lack of native GeForce NOW support on Linux, this app also provides functionality for Windows users. My goal is to refine the user interface and offer custom features for an improved experience.

ul.li: 🚀 Native-like performance
💎 Modern SteamOS-like sidebar for controlling GeForce Infinity (Ctrl+I)
🌐 Discord Rich Presence
🎯 Autofocus when gaming rig is ready
🔔 Notifications when gaming rig is ready
👨🏻‍💻 Ability to change UserAgent if having issues with defaults
🎨 Ability to change theme colors of GeForce NOW
🔄 Ability to reload GeForce NOW without restarting application
🔑 Account switching
🎮 Automatic Game Startup
📊 FPS, Connection metrics inside GeForce Infinity
Fixed bug: Notifications not having icons
Fixed bug: Apps installed with .deb not having desktop entry icons, AppImages not having icons
Added flatpak files (not yet fully ready for flathub)
Added more example screenshots by @t0msk
better project structure by @t0msk in #8
refactored whole project, moved to typescript, added eslint, upgraded… by @t0msk in #11
New UI look for the app's sidebar
Ability to switch user agent
Ability to change accent color
Theme system for both the sidebar and the nvidia main interface

description.p: After a long time of abandoning this project I recently came back to it, thanks to the people who starred and forked my repo! I noticed a bit late but it gave me a huge motivation boost and now after some big changes I feel like version 1.0.0 is ready!
As it is 1.0.0 it will have bugs and is nowhere near finished, but it has its core functionalities working.
The .exe and .zip files are for Windows; the rest are for Linux.
